Text: {T}: Search your library for a legendary card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

Text: Haste|{T}: Put a token that's a copy of target nonlegendary creature you control onto the battlefield. That token has haste. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

Name: Kresh the Bloodbraided
Text: Whenever another creature dies, you may put X +1/+1 counters on Kresh the Bloodbraided, where X is that creature's power.

Text: Mikaeus, the Lunarch enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.|{T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Mikaeus.|{T}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Mikaeus: Put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control.

Name: Omnath, Locus of Mana
Text: Green mana doesn't empty from your mana pool as steps and phases end.|Omnath, Locus of Mana gets +1/+1 for each green mana in your mana pool.

Name: Oona, Queen of the Fae
Text: Flying|{X}{U/B}: Choose a color. Target opponent exiles the top X cards of his or her library. For each card of the chosen color exiled this way, put a 1/1 blue and black Faerie Rogue creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

Name: Progenitus
Text: Protection from everything|If Progenitus would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, reveal Progenitus and shuffle it into its owner's library instead.

Name: Sharuum the Hegemon

Name: Teferi, Mage of Zhalfir
